text.autoconfig.held-item-info.title: Held Item Info Config
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.ma: The maximum number of lines to display including the item name
The maximum-ish number of characters per line
Â§iThis only affects lore and command blocks
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.re: Only show information when the corresponding HideFlags NBT tag is not set
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.li: The height of each line in pixels
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.of: The vertical offset in pixels of all the text per extra line
By default, this makes the tooltip get closer to the hotbar the more lines there are
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.ba: The time in seconds it takes for a one line tooltip to disappear
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.fa: Additional Fade Duration per Extra Line
The additional time before the tooltip fades out per extra line
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.ma: The maximum number of lines of a Command Block's command to display
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.sh: Only affects the Banner Pattern items, not actual Banners
Type of Tropical Fish in Buckets
[...] instead of showing everything but filtered enchantments
text.autoconfig.held-item-info.option.fi: Write ID's here (e.g. 'silk_touch' instead of 'Silk Touch')
Hit TAB a couple times if you can't see the text fields
